articles.title: Slave Play: No 10 criticises black-only audiences - BBC.com
articles.description: A spokesman for Prime Minister Rishi Sunak called the move, by the Noel Coward Theatre, "wrong and divisive".
articles.content:
By Leisha Chi-SantorelliBBC News Culture
Slave Play received 12 nominations at the 74th Tony Awards, breaking the previous record held by Angels in America
